meanings.definition: A heavy coat worn over other clothing for warmth.
meanings.sent1: During winter, people wear overcoats to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new overcoat for the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The overcoat looked so big on the tiny puppy, it was quite a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like an overcoat, warming everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The overcoat felt like a cozy hug on a chilly day.

meanings.sent1: She overcoats the cake with a thick layer of frosting.
meanings.sent2: The painter will overcoat the walls with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overcoated his sandwich with too much mustard.
meanings.sent4: The snow overcoated the entire town, turning it into a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The chef decided to overcoat the dish with a sprinkle of herbs for extra flavor.
